website_summaries.verdict: Slim case design that looks good, but that also provides a high level of protection.
pros: Thin design of the case won't add much bulk or size to the phone
Great price point for a protective case
Has only a slight texture, which further contributes to its thin profile, but it still yields just enough grip
Nice cushions on the corners to protect against drops
cons: Some sharp edges on the sides
Edges of case cover a bit of the screen

customer_reviews.title: Description is wrong.. made for s8 plus not s8
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my s8 model when I received it On the box it stated it's for a s8 plus. Online description clearly stated it is for s8. Very frustrating to now have to return and wait for the right order. The case itself is well made just wish the online details were correct
customer_reviews.author: OMendicutti

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I received this case in the mail today and it doesn't not seem like it would provide any type of protection. The case is RUBBER, all rubber. For 8.99 you can shop around and find a better case. I wish I did not buy. Huge mistake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect. Fits phone perfectly. Nice thin case that protects the phone very well. I have dropped tested it, (not intentionally), and the case and the phone didn't even get a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not able to find a screen protector that works with this case
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice but the way is shaped the screen protectors won't work. I already tried a glass and a plastic case and they continue to come of because of how the case is shaped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality and stylish case that offers great protection
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 cases for various phones over the past 6 years and have never been disappointed. The cases project a high-quality and appearance. What I enjoy most is that they are slim yet provide ample protection for your phone. The case has a very nice tactile kind of feel and provides just the right amount of grip to prevent an accidental drop. It is also easy to remove if needed. My only problem is that I had a difficult decision in choosing which one of all of the Caseology cases that I liked the best for my new GS8. Guess I am going to have to buy several more and change them up occasionally!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the Galaxy s8 and wireless charging works flawlessly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case weeks before my Galaxy s8 arrived and so far I am very satisfied with this purchase. The case fits perfectly and fits nice my hand. It reminds me of the feel of the Galaxy s7 Active because of the extra protections around the corners. Wireless charging is not an issue for me and I am using a cheap wireless charger I got off of Amazon, even used another wireless charger from someone else and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Toneman

customer_reviews.title: Great compromise between protection and size
customer_reviews.text: This a beautifully built case and fits in my pocket easily, while providing protection at the corners, which have proven to be an S8 weak point. What I enjoy most is that the case thickness is tapered around the camera and finger print reader allowing easy access to the fingerprinter reader. The case buttons, on top of phone's side buttons, provide easy button operation compared to some cases which just leave holes for access to the buttons. This is a well built case for the S8.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A Hottman

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something sturdy, but not bulky or chunky
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something sturdy, but not bulky or chunky, which is why I think this design is flawless. Fits beautifully on my phone; it's so sleek and fitted that it doesn't even look like a case. I had 2 people ask me what kind of phone I have, because of this. Will definately recommend them and purchase from them in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I really like this case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. I tried several others first. Slim, comfortable, and some grip. It could use to be a tad softer for more grip, but then I am sure it would cost double. Doesn't like to be paired with the glass screen protector. I think those all suck anyways for the S8. We tried several brands and ended up with the neoflex screen protector. Most of the one star reviews have to do with getting the wrong case. Be careful when ordering that you are not buying the S8+ case. I made that mistake as well and admit it was my fault for not looking closer before checking out.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price
customer_reviews.text: Caseology has been a great company that I've bought from over the years. I'm always impressed by how smooth and sleak their cases feel. It doesn't make me feel like I've made my phone into a big brick while also keeping it safe. The only thing I must warn you about is that the front isn't very protected due to the curved screen. That's not caseology's fault though. The phone design leaves it in a compromised state unless you add a screen protector on it. Other than that you're in good hands.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Nice case though slippery compared to gel cases. Good for guy's pockets but a higher risk of slipping out of your hand. Hard to text since the sides are slim for the curved screen. I have not yet dropped the phone so I have not tested the slim-everywhere-but-in-the-corners design.
customer_reviews.author: OldHRHitter

customer_reviews.title: Great case! Really sharp looking finish to the back
customer_reviews.text: Great case! Really sharp looking finish to the back. If your looking for a case that won't add much to the size of the phone I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: John N

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product, looks exactly how it is presented
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product, looks exactly how it is presented, I've only bought Caseology cases since I've heard of the company when I had a Galaxy S4. The case are always quality and have protected my phones through the years from falls that could have completely destroyed them. Would reccomend this case and company for anyone looking to buy a case that is sleek and effective! 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable. Great feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the best phone case i had ever purchased for my phone. I had this case for over a year with no issues at all. It protected my phone from hard drops. And it is a life saver. Love it and would buy it again on a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A. Norman

customer_reviews.title: pretty great case and glad I bought it online here ...
customer_reviews.text: The product appears just as the listing shows it. There was no trouble putting my Galaxy S8 inside of the case, just simply insert the phone in and presto. The case also feels firm, but not awkward. This helps as I found the surface of the Galaxy S8's back to be too smooth and slippery, so the more solid texture keeps me from dropping my phone. Overall, pretty great case and glad I bought it online here instead of paying over 50 dollars from my local phone retailers.
customer_reviews.author: John Dogan

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Definitely looks as good if not better than the pictures, feels good in the hand. Seems like it offers a good deal of protection as well, will edit review if anything happens to change my opinion on the overall protection. Edit: Definitely worth the price, I drop mine all the time and there's no additional cracks since i bought it. Even with the one crack i have from a previous case, it still manages to keep it from spreading at all. Get this for sure if you haven't decided.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Actually made the Galaxy S8 a lot more comfortable to hold for me. Haven't dropped on hard surface yet, but feels durable and I feel pretty confident with this case. Simple classic modern design is another plus.
customer_reviews.author: Jamazons

customer_reviews.title: Nice case!
customer_reviews.text: I've had for about 2 weeks, nice slim design, feels comfortable and I've had a few drops with no breakage
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this phone case company
customer_reviews.text: The fit is flawless. Glad I found this phone case company. My go to company for phone cases here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Todd DeMatteo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case. Thin
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case. Thin. Sturdy. Perfect! I bought two just in case, but decided to go with this one as it was slightly thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Full body protection
customer_reviews.text: Each time I get a new phone, I painstakingly look for screen protectors and cases. With this upgrade, I did not have to invest much time. I have been so impressed with the past caseology cases that I just had to find one I liked. I chose this case for the extra corner protection and simplicity in color. My prior caseology case was unfortunately put to the test with drops and falls. The phone is being returned in perfect shape. This is a testament of the caseology case.
customer_reviews.author: Greg F

customer_reviews.title: and pretty slippery for the hands
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, and pretty slippery for the hands. I really doubt it would do much to help save fron the damage of a fall. It looks nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Extremely lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Extremely lightweight, fits like a glove and comfortable to hold. The padded corners act not only as a protective measure, but also as a grip. Coming from someone who drops their phone quite regularly, I don't think I've dropped it once since I purchased this case 2 weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Aribop

customer_reviews.title: Samsung case A+
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit of this case! Works great protecting my phone as well as fit in my hand! Thx. for great products fast shipping and smooth buying process!!! A+
customer_reviews.author: Dboss4noone

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't fit right with the glass protector on my phone only without my glass protector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this product for years it has never failed even without a protection screen on my phone. Reliable and durable. And believe me when I tell you this even through hot frying oil that I got into an accident at work it went through my pants and got my phone. The case didn't melt at all. I recommended this product everytime!!!! Let the picture tell the talking you compare my old one and now my new one. Caseology is the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Superb case
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this case for 2 years now and have nothing to complain about. It is slim, durable and offers good protection. I dropped my phone several times and do not have a scratch neither on the screen nor on the case itself. It also works perfectly with wireless charging. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: rnt

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Tight fit to the phone abf great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and slim enough to fit in an air vent phone holder (spring loaded drop phone in style). Looks great and has saved my phone when dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great case for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, works well, makes the phone nonslip, makes the buttons less sensitive so I'm not pushing them when I don't want to. I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Case. Hairline thicker than I wanted it
customer_reviews.text: Great Case. Hairline thicker than I wanted it, so bought another case, but 99.9% of people who buy this will be ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: I love caselogy
customer_reviews.text: I just received it in the mail today and I already love it. I've always been a caseologist and will always be because the cases are just amazing and very slim so its barely a difference from the original size.It has style and protection. Perfect score from me.
customer_reviews.author: JSRReactions

customer_reviews.title: I tested this case just as the instructions recommended: Seal it completely then sink it underwater for ...
customer_reviews.text: I tested this case just as the instructions recommended: Seal it completely then sink it underwater for several minutes without the phone first as a test. It performed extremely well. It is truly water proof. One annoyance: the USB charge port door tends to come off occasionally. The hinge pin could be improved. Other than that, it is a very good water proof case......
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed and made product providing all functionalities I needed. My second order of S8 case. This one provide better protection of corners and glass than my first one Spigen product. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike N.

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: It feels very high quality and looks quite nice on the phone. It is slim and adds minimal bulk to the phone. It also adds plenty of much needed grip to this phone. For the money this case is absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great case, my 4 year old likes to throw my phone across the room and nothing has happend! Great case
customer_reviews.author: neilo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good Case that is built well. It has saved my phone a few times already.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Looks good. Non-slip, but not rubbery where it won't easily slide into a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Kris M

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple case
customer_reviews.text: Simple case but effective. Despite the curved screen the raised corners provide face down fall protection!
customer_reviews.author: Hydrazi

customer_reviews.title: I have researched many cases for my S8. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have researched many cases for my S8. I purchased this one and it not only fits perfectly but also protected it from bumps and falls. My one year old constantly takes my phone and this case protects it being damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: truly frustrating cause the case is nice!
customer_reviews.text: its too close to the edges, so when using a screen protector, of any kind or thickness, it lifts them off....truly frustrating cause the case is nice!
customer_reviews.author: GalapagosD

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Item is as described in listing. The case protects the corners and fit like a glove out of the box. Great grip and texture on the back of the case. The case adds a little heft but is very balanced. The case can be used with a plastic 0.18 mm screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: AKreedman

customer_reviews.title: Complete phone protection
customer_reviews.text: This case gives the best protection a case can give. It wraps around the phone to cover all corners and the glass so you don't have to worry about it breaking if you drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Heishman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking case, though back is a bit slippery. Good grip on the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Offers little to no protection on front... the most vulnerable part of the s8.  TRASH.  DO NOT ORDER
customer_reviews.text: Offers little to no protection on front... the most vulnerable part of the s8. TRASH. DO NOT ORDER
customer_reviews.author: jake ankrom

customer_reviews.title: Good for less
customer_reviews.text: Case works great. Does offer protection to the sides and back of the phone. There was no screen protector so that will have to be purchased separately. The case has definitely offered protection against minor drops.
customer_reviews.author: J. Broaddus

customer_reviews.title: The price was very low and the quality of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The price was very low and the quality of the product was very high. It is sleek, elegant, and functional, can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: My son got one, so I followed his advice and got one too. It is everything I wanted in a case for durability. And it looks great! I'd recommend it to anyone looking for an advanced product in a crowded field of similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: It is very flexible which makes me feel like the phone would break with a single drop
customer_reviews.text: The case is not what I expected in terms of proteccion. It is very flexible which makes me feel like the phone would break with a single drop. The material is really good, seems durable and it has a great quality, but as a protector case doesn't give you that feeling of protection. It's just rubber, which you can easily fold in half. Good product with at a great price but not satisfied with the proteccion.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro M.

customer_reviews.title: Best case out there for the best price!
customer_reviews.text: Best case out there for the S8. Makes the phone much easier to hold without making it too bulky. Much better than the $45 cases they sell in stores. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sam J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Fits perfectly snug. On a side note this case is not compatible with this glass screen protector: Coscod The protector shattered when I put the case back on.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Augustowicz

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: The best cover for s8 you feel active device and slim. I have been used it for 4 months and is still new and protect very well my device.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Baez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Works well with wireless charging. Not slick like some cases. Big knobby corners for protection. Great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality phone case
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Fits well and does a good job protecting the phone
customer_reviews.author: Trogdor

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking case Decent grip Firm yet still flexible Doesnt cover up the edge, which i like because the S8 is a beautiful phone
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for anyone who wants slim design with semi protection.
customer_reviews.text: Slim design doesn't add much to overall size for pocket. Still can access the side apps. The corner bumpers have saved phone on 2 drops already from about 3 ft. I don't think it will fit well with a screen cover but I don't use one anyway.
customer_reviews.author: ABChowFun

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive quality product, I'd purchase again and would recommend as an every day case.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. MN USA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Survived a fall from moving vehicle. What more can I say.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Gossage

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It does not make the phone feel bulky at all. It's corners offer extra protection for the corners of the phone. The button covers are very responsive, no difficulty there. It is very easy to put on and off. I ordered the black case and it looks very professional.
customer_reviews.author: Deisi

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and fits snugly around the phone
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and fits snugly around the phone. Only minor problem is the ridge around the fingerprint scanner, so wait to configure your fingerprint until after you get the case itself or you might have slight issues with the phone reading your already synchronized scan.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: very good looking case and for sure i will recommend it ...
customer_reviews.text: i was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the build. and it looks sleeker on my phone than in the pictures. very good looking case and for sure i will recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Chinatsu Kitahara

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Slim fit. Looks nice. Fits my s8 perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Honest words

customer_reviews.title: Great-looking, slim case with some unexpected sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: The case looks great and is extremely thin, but the way it is cut leaves the edges sharp. When you hold it in certain ways and especially if you put it up to your ear to talk, the edges made it very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Solomon

customer_reviews.title: My son has this case and recommended it to me
customer_reviews.text: My son has this case and recommended it to me. It fits very nice in my pocket and easy to hold. I dropped it on the floor by accident a few times and no damage to the case or my phone. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: scuba

customer_reviews.title: A thing that I like about this case is that the aux cord can ...
customer_reviews.text: A thing that I like about this case is that the aux cord can be placed into the inlet while the case is on the phone. I had a thick cable which prevented the cord to be plugged in all the way in some other cases I owned.
customer_reviews.author: June Castro

customer_reviews.title: Good cover for a tricky curved phone
customer_reviews.text: Good case overall, with good coverage for a tricky curved phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the price and slick looking to boot!
customer_reviews.author: chris hicks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, fit and comfort. And still allows easy access to buttons. This is the only protective case I purchase for all of my previous phones.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used this case for 2+ years and couldn't be happier.

customer_reviews.title: good case
customer_reviews.text: good case. I've already dropped phone several times and no cracked glass.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: A few weeks into use and it is exactly what I needed. Not bulky, good grip and good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Ex-iPhoner

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect case, I was worried it's be too bulky, but it was slim and lightweight, with plenty of protection. It looks even better than the picture, will definitely be buying from caseology again!
customer_reviews.author: Kacie A.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love the slim, solid, sleek feel it has in my hands. The case literally makes me feel like it's a new phone. It's simple and stylish. I've already recommended it to two of my friends.

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this case
customer_reviews.text: Looks classy and protects the edges very well! I highly recommend this case.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband who is hard on his ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who is hard on his phones. He hasn't yet cracked his phone..hooray! I can't believe so much value at this price..don't see that anymore 👍
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Santana

customer_reviews.title: Very little bulk while giving a great sense of protection
customer_reviews.text: Very little bulk while giving a great sense of protection. Very sleek design, provides a good surface to attach my Popsocket to.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: It's a good basic case
customer_reviews.text: It's a good basic case, which was all I wanted. I do like the bumped out corners that make it easier to grip, and the area along the fingerprint sensor to guide your finger without looking.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Fink

customer_reviews.title: This is a great case! It grips very well and the buttons ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case! It grips very well and the buttons work great. Will definitely look for future cases from caseology in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Solid case
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel if the case. Super sturdy but light!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice basic case.

customer_reviews.text: I personally dont like the feel of this case, it reminds me of scratching a notebook cover.

customer_reviews.text: Great silicone case. Thick enough to protect your phone yet thin enough to not make your phone to feel like it has doubled in size. The brushed metal and carbon fiber design keeps it from looking plain.

product_meta.title: Caseology Vault I for Samsung Galaxy S8 Case (2017) - Black
product_meta.description: Caseology Vault Designed for Samsung Galaxy S8 Case
feature_bullets: Thin rugged protection case with shock absorbing features adds minimal bulk to your phone
Flexible single-piece TPU cover offers the durability needed to protect against everyday wear and tear
Slightly textured cover with brushed metal design and carbon fiber detail for a comfortable secure grip
Responsive button covers with crisp tactile feedback, precise cutouts and raised front lip protection
Caseology Vault Designed for Samsung Galaxy S8 Case

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars427 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
